mapper.sql: ID, QR_CODE_ID, GET_ID, NAME, ZJLX, ZJHM, QR_URL, OPERATOR, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_cer_print_qr_code
ID,
QR_CODE_ID,
GET_ID,
NAME,
ZJLX,
ZJHM,
QR_URL,
OPERATOR,
OPERATE_TIME,
QR_CODE,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{qrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update oms_cer_print_qr_code
QR_CODE_ID = #{qrCodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_ID = #{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QR_URL = #{qrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QR_CODE = #{qrCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oms_cer_print_qr_code set QR_CODE_ID = #{qrCodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_ID = #{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QR_URL = #{qrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QR_CODE = #{qrCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update oms_cer_print_qr_code set QR_CODE_ID = #{qrCodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GET_ID = #{getId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QR_URL = #{qrUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.cer_id cerId, c.work_unit workUnit, b.name, if(b.sex='1','男',if(b.sex='2','女',b.sex)) sex, b.csrq, c.post, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='zjlqzt' and item_code=a.get_status) getStatus, b.zjlx, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='ZJLX' and item_code=b.zjlx) zjlxName, b.zjhm, b.yxqz, a.spb_get_ele_sign spb, b.surely_way surelyWay, if(b.surely_way='0','证照机',if(b.surely_way='1','柜台',b.surely_way)) surelyWayName, b.cabinet_num cabinetNum, b.place, b.counter_num counterNum, a.data_source dataSource, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='zjlqsjly' and item_code=b.zjlx) dataSourceName, a.happen_Date happenDate, a.create_time createTime FROM cf_user d INNER JOIN oms_cer_get_task a ON d.org_id = a.rf_b0000 INNER JOIN cf_certificate b ON a.cer_id = b.id INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo c ON a.oms_id = c.id
mapper.select:
WHERE d.user_id=#{id} AND a.get_status='0'
AND a.data_source !='3'
